longDescription: The building sits at the core of the triangular site framed by 'Slivnica' Blvd and Troleyna Str. The project aims to create a space that can accommodate all the public administration for the particular district, various public events, and provide the building's optimal functionality. Building contribution assumes good connections with city hall and the State Archive.
The following solutions have sought to achieve the concept and as a result of many types of research:
optimal transparency which underlines the democratic character of the Town Hall
the building evokes clarity, honesty and freedom of expression - values essential to the proper functioning of civil society
to provide pedestrian access from all sides
the analysis of existing afforestation on the site determines an area to locate the building due to its geometry and the trees' position.
